Question: Bonanza co-star David Canary said that one word that described this person was "fearless" in his dealings with network brass.
Hints: This person decided on his surname by choosing it from a phone book.
In 1941, when this person was four years old, he and his family moved to the Philadelphia suburb of Collingswood, New Jersey.
This person's character was the youngest, sometimes quick tempered Cartwright brother.
